item.title: Help fix dupe
item.dc:creator: @shadow43 shadow43
item.description:
@shadow43 wrote:

If Grand Exchange doesn’t have any dupes you can add it and delete whole trade. Besides Scape java i thing your code doesn’t fix all of dupes… Need to add something like saving when you trading, becouese when you are in trede interface it doesn’t save char. I had tried to add lots of other dupes but it had maked my server terible. There are alot of dupes which is fixing the dupe but allowing another… When i added one of those know in my server you don’t have to know how to dupe, just player a gives player b item then player a trades with player c and it bugs and shows in trade the item you have gived to player b LOL. Sorry if i do grammar mistakes it’s my second language.

Read full topic

yea but if u delete it. it will automatically close out the trade box after u clicked decline.

item.title: Help fix dupe
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“bloodmaniet, post:8, topic:307171”][quote author=HiddenPker link=topic=403299.msg2986875#msg2986875 date=1255040132]
rep for the person who helps me
[/quote] here u go its actually simple i just experimented and it works for delta and any other source! here u go…

Step 1:
open up client.java in server files.

Step 2:
search for: if (inTrade && (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastButton > 1000)) {
(sorry its not in code form… idk how to do it in a reply.)

Step 3:
you should see: if (inTrade && (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastButton > 1000)) {
lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
getClient(trade_reqId).sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
declineTrade();
}

Step 4:
just replace the code above with this:
if (inTrade) {
getClient(trade_reqId).sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
declineTrade();
}

All your basically doing is removing the time interval in the trade. which is lastbutton and timemillis just make sure u have it
as the code above the :
if (inTrade) {
getClient(trade_reqId).sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
declineTrade();
}

There you go hope ive helped… ill add it as a tut soon[/quote]

ily C + P Skillz.

Read full topic

lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();

}

Step 4:
just replace the code above with this:

All your basically doing is removing the time interval in the trade. which is lastbutton and timemillis just make sure u have it
as the code above the :
if (inTrade) {
getClient(trade_reqId).sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);

There you go hope ive helped… ill add it as a tut soon
